title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings.
description: The bug report is about the title of the hyperlink builder changing unexpectedly.
OB: When you click on 'OK' and then reopen the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that its title becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The expected behavior is that the hyperlink builder's title should always be 'Hyperlink Options' regardless of the settings.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
2. Click on 'OK'.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
